definition: a tried and tested medical prescription

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: It showed that it could be used for clinical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 說明該驗方可以進行臨牀治療試驗。

sentences.english: The blended water chestnut-sugarcane juice (BWCSJ) is a health beverage designed according to the food-therapy theory of traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 馬蹄甘蔗汁是中醫傳統食療保健理論記載的食療驗方。

sentences.english: There are many effective folk remedies also collected in this book.
sentences.chinese: 本書內保存不少民間驗方。

sentences.english: Two infallible receipts I must insert before I proceed further.
sentences.chinese: 首先我得告訴你兩個絕對有效的驗方。

definition: liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
to desensitize/to remove an allergic susceptibility
impotence/also written 陽痿|阳痿[yang2 wei3]
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
